details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-4:2020 - 6.9 Embedded files
details.description: A PDF/A-4f conforming file shall contain an EmbeddedFiles key in the name dictionary of the document catalog dictionary.

rule.description: A PDF/A-4f conforming file shall contain an EmbeddedFiles key in the name dictionary of the document catalog dictionary.

error.message: A PDF/A-4f conforming file does not contain an EmbeddedFiles key in the name dictionary of the document catalog dictionary.
